channel.title: Hemera - Oldschool eco/pking server
channel.description:
[b]Note: Server name will most likely change.[/b]
I decided to quit my last project because I simply don't like newer revision data, this is the same server though, but new revision content is removed.
[size=16pt]Server Information:[/size] As some of you may know, all of my servers are based of Delta(heavily modified). This server has netty networking implemented and all content (Except basics like PM-system, banking, trading etc, might rewrite some of those later) are written from scratch. The goal of this project is to create an oldschool style server with tons of skills, minigames, and a great server to pk on.
[size=16pt]Goals:[/size]
[size=12pt]Combat:[/size] ● Combat styles (Melee, Ranging, Magic) ● Formula's (Got them, just have to implement them) ● Effects (Magic effects, special attack effects etc.) ● Poisoning ● Special Attacks (Just a few more to add) ● Barrows degrading (Only got to make it fully degrade on death yet) ● Other ranging weapons (Knifes, darts, crossbows) ● Autocasting
[size=12pt]Skills:[/size] ● Prayer (Even though most prayers work right now, prayer will be rewritten later on) ● Mining ● Woodcutting ● Slayer ● Firemaking (Need to rewrite object handling so changed objects are visible to everyone) ● Thieving ● Smithing ● Fletching ● Herblore ● Agility (Not decided) ● Fishing ● Cooking
[size=12pt]Minigames:[/size] ● Barrows (Includes prayer draining, minimap disabling etc.) ● Treasure Trails (Includes Emote's[double agent], Maps, Search, Anagram and coordinate clues) ● Fight Caves ● Pest Control ● Champion minigame ● You can get a champion scroll (easy, medium or hard) from npcs ● Once you enter the champion fight area, there's no way out, you will lose your scroll once you enter the fight area ● You don't lose items on death ● There are 4 npcs you have to kill ● If you defeat all champions, you will be rewarded with a casket, this give all kinds of rewards, including experience lamps
[size=12pt]Bosses:[/size] ● The Everlasting ● Uses magic and melee ● Ignores protection prayers ● Hits up to 25 with melee and 22 with magic ● Glod ● 1/3 chance to disable all your prayers ● 1/3 chance to poison you by 15 (only if not poisoned) ● 1/3 chance to devide your prayer points by 2 (so if you had 50 it will become 25) ● Hits up to 48 without protect melee and up to 24 with
[size=16pt]Server Media:[/size] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2qcq88h.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/30tl7ba.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/mw7a50.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/5kiulg.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/122gh7d.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/53okdw.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/16hlwt5.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/157gpyp.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/6nz4hc.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2hi4gar.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2wmnl8p.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/28rp4yc.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ed38d0.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2qxm6ag.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/29mnix2.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2e2dv91.png[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=26RUbfcjLYw[/youtube] [size=8pt]More pictures and videos will be added soon...[/size]
[size=16pt]Credits:[/size] ● Delta_ ● Int Bauk ● Arrowzftw (from R-S) ● Graham ● Killamess ● Palidino76 And probably some others I forgot

item.title: Hemera - Oldschool eco/pking server
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

Bump working on this again

Updates:

  • Added custom coordinate scrolls
  • Added a boss: The Everlasting (normally needs to be killed for Dream Mentor quest)
  • Run energy regain rate now depends your agility level
  • Fixed equipment bugs

2hi4gar.png744×492

2wmnl8p.png736×486

28rp4yc.png739×489

EDIT:

Working on another boss, Glod

I’m still thinking about other of Glod’s effects, but right now he has the following effects:
- Glod has 1/3 chance to disable all your prayers.
- Glod has 1/3 chance to poison you by 15 (only if not poisoned).
- Glod has 1/3 chance to devide your prayer points by 2 (so if you had 50 it will become 25).
- Glod hits up to 48 without protect melee and up to 24 with.

2ed38d0.png744×487

EDIT 2:
Added a champion minigame
- You can get a champion scroll (easy, medium or hard) from npcs
- Once you enter the champion fight area, there’s no way out, you will lose your scroll if you lose/logout/die
- You don’t lose items on death
- There are 4 npcs you have to kill
- If you defeat them all, you will be rewarded with a casket, this give all kinds of rewards, including experience lamps

Read full topic
